section.title: Tracers
section.para: Each Resource Adaptor Entity uses a single JAIN SLEE 1.1 Tracer, named MscResourceAdaptor . The related Log4j Logger category, which can be used to change the Tracer level from Log4j configuration, is javax.slee.RAEntityNotification[entity=MSCRA] .

section.title: Alarms
section.para: &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor does not emit alarms
